SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am13
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am13.controller

Interface GameListener

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameListenerServerRMI, GameListenerServerSocket
public interface GameListener extends Serializable
Interface to be implemented by the classes that handle the communication between the server and the clients. It contains methods to update the game state of the clients.

  • Method Details

    • getPlayer

      PlayerLobby getPlayer()
      Returns:
      Player corresponding to this listener

    • getPing

      Long getPing()
      Returns:
      Last stored ping

    • updatePlayerJoinedRoom

      void updatePlayerJoinedRoom(PlayerLobby player)
      Updates the client that a player has joined a lobby (waiting for a game)
      Parameters:
      player - player who joined

    • updatePlayerLeftRoom

      void updatePlayerLeftRoom(PlayerLobby player)
      Updates the client that a player has left a lobby (waiting for a game)
      Parameters:
      player - player who left

    • updateStartGame

      void updateStartGame(GameModelIF model, GameController controller)
      Updates the client that the game has started: starter cards and initial cards have been given to the players. The client is notified passing the GameModelIF containing a GameModel with GameStatus set to INIT.
      Parameters:
      model - The game model containing current game's state for the newly started game
      controller - The controller of the newly started game

    • updateGameModel

      void updateGameModel(GameModelIF model, GameController controller, PlayerLobby player)
      This method should be called ONLY when a player reconnects to the game. Updates the client of the reconnected player with the updated game model and corresponding player.
      Parameters:
      model - The updated game model
      controller - The controller of the game
      player - The updated player who is reconnecting.

    • updatePlayedStarter

      void updatePlayedStarter(PlayerLobby player, CardStarterIF cardStarter, List<Coordinates> availableCoords)
      Updates the client that a player has played their starter card.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that played the starter card.
      cardStarter - The starter card played.
      availableCoords - The list of coordinates that are available to play a card

    • updateChosenPersonalObjective

      void updateChosenPersonalObjective(PlayerLobby player, CardObjectiveIF chosenObj)
      Updates the client that a player has chosen their personal objective card.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that chose the personal objective card.
      chosenObj - Objective card chosen by the player

    • updateNextTurn

      void updateNextTurn(PlayerLobby player)
      Updates the client that the turn has passed to another player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that is going to play the next turn.

    • updatePlayedCard

      void updatePlayedCard(PlayerLobby player, CardPlayableIF cardPlayed, Coordinates coord, int points, List<Coordinates> availableCoords)
      Updates the client when a player plays a card.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that played the card.
      cardPlayed - The card played.
      coord - The coordinates where the card has been placed, relative to the player's field.
      points - The points given by the card.
      availableCoords - The list of coordinates that are available to play a card

    • updatePickedCard

      void updatePickedCard(PlayerLobby player, List<? extends CardPlayableIF> updatedVisibleCards, CardPlayableIF pickedCard)
      Updates the client when a player picks a card from the common visible cards.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that picked the card.
      updatedVisibleCards - The updated list of visible cards in the common field.
      pickedCard - The card picked by the player

    • updatePoints

      void updatePoints(Map<PlayerLobby,Integer> pointsMap)
      Updates the client when the points given by Objective cards (common and personal) have been calculated.
      Parameters:
      pointsMap - A map containing the points of each player.

    • updateWinner

      void updateWinner(List<PlayerLobby> winners)
      Updates the client with the winner
      Parameters:
      winners - The player(s) that has won the game.

    • updateEndGame

      void updateEndGame()
      Updates the client about ending of game. After this update, the server should not respond to any other request from the clients

    • updatePlayerDisconnected

      void updatePlayerDisconnected(PlayerLobby player)
      Updates the client with the player that has disconnected from the game.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that has disconnected.

    • closeConnection

      void closeConnection()
      Closes the connection for the player associated to this listener

    • updatePlayerReconnected

      void updatePlayerReconnected(PlayerLobby player)
      Updates the client with the player that has reconnected to the game.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that has reconnected.

    • updateFinalPhase

      void updateFinalPhase(int turnsToEnd)
      Updates the client that the game is in the final phase.
      Parameters:
      turnsToEnd - Number of turns to reach the end of the turn-based phase

    • updateInGame

      void updateInGame()
      Updates the client that the game has begun the turn-based phase.

    • updatePing

      void updatePing()
      Updates last ping received, and sends the update to the client

    • updateChatMessage

      void updateChatMessage(PlayerLobby sender, List<PlayerLobby> receivers, String text)
      Updates the client with a chat message
      Parameters:
      sender - of the message
      receivers - of the message
      text - content of the message
